dialogue: Young man, do you know a student named Elwood Curtis?
They told me that he... I just want... Would you please...
I've come all this way... it's a crime to keep me from him, a crime. I don't know what kind of place this is, I don't understand why they can't let me see him.
) Thank you young man, thank you. What is your name?
Nice to know I can count on somebody round here, Turner.
When's the last time you had family visit, Turner?
...They... well, my kin, my parents, I mean my ma, she...
Well I came all this way. I can't hug Elwood, so you'll have to do.
What are they feeding you all in here? I know you can muster a better hug than that.
I'll expect it the next time, Turner. The world needs strong young men like you.
How you making out here, hero?
There's four ways out of Nickel and you were almost awarded one for "ineffective heroism".
